Status: prototype Upload a file

How do internal users upload files?

User need

As a producer of stats, I need to upload my file so that it can be processed by the publishing team.

To do

  • Look for existing resources
  • Kick off user research with internal team
  • Look at Florence (internal content management system)
  • Sketch out user journey
  • Mock-up user interface

Considerations

  • explaining what to upload
  • choose a file
  • uploading progress
  • feeding back errors
  • multiple uploads
